package.name: Net_FTP
package.summary: Net_FTP provides an OO interface to the PHP FTP functions plus some additions
package.description: Net_FTP allows you to communicate with FTP servers in a more comfortable way than the native FTP functions of PHP do. The class implements everything nativly supported by PHP and additionally features like recursive up- and downloading, dircreation and chmodding. It although implements an observer pattern to allow for example the view of a progress bar.
package.notes:
Another month of testing did not bring any more critical bugs to daylight. Therefore and because PEAR 1.4.0 will depend optionally on Net_FTP I decided to run the next stable release. The following changes were made to the package files:
- Updated year. - Updated docblocks regarding the new standard. - Fixed whitespace issues. - Fixed bug 3362: bug in Net_FTP::_rm_file.
